Package org.graffiti.plugin.view

Interface View2D

All Superinterfaces:
AttributeListener, Autoscroll, EdgeListener, EventListener, GraphListener, NodeListener, TransactionListener, View, Zoomable, ZoomListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
ButtonOverlayView, GraffitiView, IPKGraffitiView
public interface View2D
extends View
A 2D view as a graphical representation for a graph.
Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
$Author: morla $
